snippet.title: Rogue Drone Hunter - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Action Roguelike 💥 + Turn-based Card Deckbuilder 🃏
Hey, I'm announcing a new roguelike game, which merges card deckbuilding with real-time combat!  Explore the dangerous outskirts of Elysia to collect powerful cards and game-changing perks in your fight to defend humanity against dangerous machines.  Team up with your drone companion to uncover the mysterious origins of the rogue drone threat.

⭕ Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3331400/Rogue_Drone_Hunter/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement

Links:
🌐 Twitter: https://x.com/Sky_Reverie
🌐 Discord: https://discord.gg/NSwXbq569x
🌐 BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/skyreverie.bsky.social
🌐 Website: https://roguedronehunter.com

#indiegame #roguelike #gaming
